description.english: Begin your training.
description.german: Beginne dein Training.
description.french: Commencez votre entrainement.
description.italian: Comincia l'Allenamento.
description.spanish: Empieza tu entrenamiento.
description.japanese: トレーニングを始めよう。
description.dutch: Begin jouw training.

description.english: Learn more about climbing mechanics.
description.german: Lerne mehr über die Klettermechaniken.
description.french: Apprenez plus de méchaniques d'escalade.
description.italian: Impara di più sulle meccaniche di arrampicamento.
description.spanish: Aprende más sobre técnicas de escalada.
description.japanese: クライミングの力学を学ぼう。
description.dutch: Leer meer over de klimtechnieken.
description.turkish: Tırmanma mekanikleri hakkında daha fazla şey öğren.

description.english: Climb home through the open window.
description.german: Schaffe es durch dein Fenster nach Hause.
description.french: Rejoignez la maison à travers la fenêtre ouverte.
description.italian: Entra a casa attraverso la finestra aperta.
description.spanish: Entra a casa por la ventana abierta.
description.japanese: 開いている窓から家に帰ろう。
description.dutch: Klim naar huis door het open raam.
description.czech: Dostaň se domů přes otevřené okno!

description.english: Climb the antenna to save the kitty.
description.german: Erklimme die Antenne um die Katze zu retten.
description.french: Escaladez l'antenne pour sauver le chatton.
description.italian: Arrampicati su per la torre per salvare il gatto.
description.spanish: Escala la antena para salvar al minino.
description.russian: Заберись на антенну и спаси кошку.
description.japanese: 子猫を助けるためにアンテナを登ろう。
description.dutch: Beklim de antenne om de kat te redden.
description.czech: Vylez na vysílač a zachraň kocoura!

description.english: Make your way out of the prison.
description.german: Finde deinen Weg aus dem Gefängnis
description.french: Evadez-vous de la prison.
description.italian: Scappa dalla prigione.
description.spanish: Sal de la cárcel.
description.japanese: 刑務所から脱出しよう。
description.dutch: Vind een weg uit de gevangenis.

description.english: Escape the hospital.
description.german: Fliehe aus dem Krankenhaus.
description.french: Echappez-vous de l'hôpital.
description.italian: Scappa dall'ospedale.
description.spanish: Escapa del hospital.
description.japanese: 病院を抜け出そう。
description.dutch: Ontsnap uit het ziekenhuis.

description.english: Escape from the CCPD through the rooftops.
description.german: Fliehe über die Dächer aus dem CCPD.
description.french: Echappez-vous du CCPD à travers les toits.
description.italian: Scappa dalla polizia attraverso i tetti.
description.spanish: Escapa del CCPD por las azoteas.
description.japanese: 屋上からCCPDを脱出しよう。
description.dutch: Ontsnap aan de politie via de daken.

description.english: Stop the broken monorail.
description.german: Halte den kaputten Zug auf.
description.french: Arrêtez le monorail cassé.
description.italian: Ferma la monorotaia.
description.spanish: Para el monorraíl averiado.
description.japanese: 暴走モノレールを止めろ！
description.dutch: Stop de kapotte monorail.

displayName.japanese: ドラマチック・クライミング

description.english: Save a man in the old theatre.
description.german: Rette den Mann im alten Theater.
description.french: Sauvez l'homme dans le vieux théatre.
description.italian: Salva l'uomo nel vecchio teatro.
description.spanish: Salva a un hombre en el antiguo teatro.
description.japanese: 古い劇場で人を助けよう。
description.dutch: Red de man in het oude theater.

description.english: Inspect the gravitational anomaly in the laboratory.
description.german: Untersuche die Gravitationsanomalie im Labor.
description.french: Inspectez l'anomalie gravitationelle dans le laboratoire.
description.italian: Inspeziona l'anomalia gravitazionale nel laboratorio.
description.spanish: Inspecciona la anomalía gravitacional en el laboratorio.
description.schinese: 在实验室检查重力异常。
description.japanese: 研究所の重力異常を調べよう。
description.dutch: Inspecteer het zwaartekrachtfenomeen in het laboratorium.

description.english: Infiltrate the rocket silo through the sewers.
description.german: Infiltriere das Raketensilo durch die Kanalisation.
description.french: Infiltrez le silo de missiles à travers les égoûts.
description.italian: Infiltrati nel silo del razzo attraverso le fognature.
description.spanish: Infíltrate en el silo de las naves espaciales por las alcantarillas.
description.schinese: 从下水道进入火箭发射台
description.russian: Проникни в ракетную шахту через канализацию.
description.japanese: 下水道を通ってロケットサイロに潜入しよう。
description.dutch: Infiltreer de raketsilo via de riolering.

description.english: Get aboard of the spacecraft.
description.german: Gelinge an Bord des Raumschiffes.
description.french: Montez dans la fusée.
description.italian: Entra nell'astronave.
description.spanish: Súbete a la nave espacial.
description.japanese: 宇宙船に乗り込もう。
description.dutch: Ga aan boord van het ruimteschip.

description.english: Sabotage the station and save the Earth!
description.german: Sabotiere die Station und rette die Erde!
description.french: Sabotez la station et sauvez la planète !
description.italian: Sabota la stazione e salva la Terra!
description.spanish: Sabotea la estación y salva la Tierra!
description.japanese: 宇宙ステーションを妨害して地球を救おう！
description.dutch: Saboteer het station en red de aarde!
description.czech: Sabotuj vesmírnou stanici a zachraň svět!
description.turkish: İstasyonu sabote et ve Dünya'yı kurtar!

description.english: Complete the final stage of the story.
description.german: Schließe das finale Level der Story ab.
description.french: Complètez l'étape finale de l'histoire.
description.italian: Completa la fase finale della storia.
description.spanish: Completa el escenario final de la historia
description.japanese: ストーリー最後のステージをクリアしよう。
description.dutch: Voltooi het laatste level van het verhaal.

description.english: Complete all stages of the "Step by Step" challenge mode.
description.german: Schließe alle Level des Treppe Herausforderungsmodus ab.
description.french: Complétez toutes les étapes du défi Etape par étape
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli di "Step by Step"
description.spanish: Completa todos los escenarios del modo desafío Paso a Paso.
description.schinese: 打通挑战模式“循序渐进”所有关
description.russian: Заверши все уровни испытания Шаг за шагом
description.japanese: "Step by Step"チャレンジモードを全てクリアしよう。
description.dutch: Voltooi alle levels van de uitdagingsmodus "Stap voor stap".
description.czech: Splň všechny levely výzvy Krok za krokem!
description.turkish: Adım Adım düello modunun tüm sahnelerini bitir.

description.english: Complete all stages of the "Leap of Faith" challenge mode.
description.german: Schließe alle Level des Leap of Faith Herausforderungsmodus ab.
description.french: Complètez toutes les étapes du défi Saut de Foi
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli di "Leap of Faith"
description.spanish: Completa todos los escenarios del modo desafío Salto Certero.
description.schinese: 打通挑战模式“飞跃的信心”所有关
description.russian: Заверши все уровни испытания Прыжок веры
description.japanese: "Leap of Faith"チャレンジモードを全てクリアしよう。
description.dutch: Voltooi alle levels van de uitdagingsmodus "Sprong van vertrouwen".
description.czech: Splň všechny levely výzvy Skok do prázdna!
description.turkish: İnanç Atlayışı düello modunun tüm sahnelerini bitir.

description.english: Complete all stages of the "Crazy Carts" challenge mode.
description.german: Schließe alle Level des Crazy Carts Herausforderungsmodus ab.
description.french: Complétez toutes les étapes du défi Carts Maboules
description.italian: Crazy Carts Completa tutti i livelli di "Crazy Carts"
description.spanish: Completa todos los escenarios del modo desafío Carretas Locas.
description.schinese: 打通挑战模式“疯狂的车”所有关
description.russian: Заверши все уровни испытания Безумные гонки
description.japanese: "Crazy Carts"チャレンジモードを全てクリアしよう。
description.dutch: Voltooi alle levels van de uitdagingsmodus "Krankzinnige karretjes".
description.czech: Splň všechny levely výzvy Šílené káry!

displayName.japanese: インディーゲームの支援者

description.english: Thank you for your support!
description.german: Danke für deine Unterstützung!
description.french: Merci pour votre support !
description.italian: Grazie per il tuo supporto!
description.spanish: ¡Gracias por tu apoyo!
description.japanese: 支援いただきありがとうございます！
description.dutch: Bedankt voor je steun!

description.english: Fall from a wall.
description.german: Falle von einer Kletterwand.
description.french: Tombez d'un mur.
description.italian: Cadi da un muro per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Cáete de una pared.
description.japanese: 壁から落ちる。
description.dutch: Val van een muur.

description.english: Get electrocuted.
description.german: Erhalte einen Elektroschock
description.french: Se faire électrocuter.
description.italian: Prendi una scossa elettrica.
description.spanish: Sufre una descarga.
description.japanese: 感電する。
description.dutch: Word geëlektrocuteerd.

description.english: Complete the whole story in one run, without falling or restarting even once.
description.german: Schließe die gesamte Story in einem Durchgang ab, ohne abzustürzen oder auch nur einmal zu laden.
description.french: Complètez l'histoire entière en une traite, sans tomber ou redémarrer.
description.italian: Completa tutta la storia in una seduta, senza cadere né ricominciare un livello neanche una volta.
description.spanish: Completa el modo historia de una sola tirada, sin caerte ni reiniciando ni una sola vez.
description.schinese: 一次通关，甚至没有跌落和重启过一次。
description.russian: Прошел историю за один раз без падений и перезапусков.
description.japanese: 全てのストーリーを一度も落下やリスタートすること無くクリアする。
description.dutch: Voltooi het hele verhaal in een enkele poging, zonder te vallen of te herstarten.
description.czech: Projdi celou zápletku na jeden pokus, bez pádu a restartu!
description.turkish: Tüm hikayeyi tek seferde bir kere bile düşmeden veya yeniden başlatmadan bitir.

description.english: Complete all stages of the "Fall Hazard" challenge mode.
description.german: Schließe alle Level des Absturzgefährdet Herausforderungsmodus ab.
description.french: Complètez toutes les étapes du défi Danger de chute.
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli in "Fall Hazard"
description.spanish: Completa todos los escenarios del modo desafío Riesgo de Caída.
description.schinese: 打通挑战模式“坠落危险”所有关
description.russian: Заверши все уровни испытания Опасность падения
description.japanese: "Fall Hazard"チャレンジモードを全てクリアしよう。
description.dutch: Voltooi alle levels van de uitdagingsmodus "Valgevaar".
description.czech: Splň všechny levely výzvy Nebezpečí pádu!
description.turkish: "Düşme Tehlikesi" düello modunun tüm sahnelerini bitir.

description.english: Complete all stages of the "Broken Space" challenge mode.
description.german: Schließe alle Level des Raumzeitbruch Herausforderungsmodus ab.
description.french: Complètez toutes les étapes du défi Espace Brisé.
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli in "Broken Space"
description.spanish: Completa todos los escenarios del modo desafío Espacio Fracturado.
description.schinese: 打通挑战模式“破空间”所有关
description.russian: Заверши все уровни испытания Хаос в небе
description.japanese: "Broken Space"チャレンジモードを全てクリアしよう。
description.dutch: Voltooi alle levels van de uitdagingsmodus "Kapotte ruimte".
description.czech: Splň všechny levely výzvy Zlomený prostor!
description.turkish: "Kırık Uzay" düello modunun tüm sahnelerini bitir.
